summary: Diff updates SEO metadata on several pages to use MARKETING_CONFIG.location fields and updates the MapEmbed iframe title to include full location. However, there is no evidence that MARKETING_CONFIG itself was updated to the user-provided Kekri address/phone, and the diff appears to include unrelated LeadForm behavior changes. The AboutPage truncation prevents confirming the exact “Visit Us in Kekri” heading/copy.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update MARKETING_CONFIG to match the user-provided Kekri location details (address/city/state/country and intended phone) so all displayed/tel: phone formatting matches MARKETING_CONFIG.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to the MARKETING_CONFIG file are shown in the diff summary; only pages/components import and reference MARKETING_CONFIG. Without an update to the configuration, the Kekri address/phone may not actually be configured.

missing_requirements.requirement: About page ‘Visit Us’ section displays: ‘Visit Us in Kekri’ and the Kekri address provided by the user; and no UI shows “Mumbai”/old Mumbai address/old phone.
missing_requirements.reason: The AboutPage diff is truncated before the ‘Visit Us’ section, and no other diffs show removal of hardcoded “Mumbai”/old address/old phone across the entire UI. SEO strings were updated in some pages, but global verification/removal cannot be confirmed from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Lead form submission now guards based on backend actor readiness, adds loading states, and replaces technical errors with user-friendly messages.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states no backend changes are required and focuses only on location/contact copy updates; LeadForm behavioral changes are unrelated to the Kekri location update.
